name: Dice Mage (itch) (LM, Luiz Felipe Bustamante)
description:
*WARNING* We know about the bug that does not allow to take damage, but we can't fix because of the game jam, if you get this bug, just f5 the page and it will disappear, sorry about that!

Use your random spells to destroy your enemies and score as many points as possible

How to Play:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse Left Click to use first slot of spell
  • Mouse Right Click to use second slot of spell
  • Spells:
    • Fire: put fire on enemies
    • Water: enemies get wet and floor get wet too
    • Root: locks enemy in place
    • Thunder: electrocute enemies
  • We have combos!
    • Fire + Root: put fire on root
    • Water + Fire: stop enemies' fire
    • Thunder + Water: water on floor gets electrocuted
